  • Method Details

    • addDelivery

      public model.Delivery addDelivery(model.Intersection intersection, LocalDate date, int timeWindow, model.Courier courier)
      add a delivery to the list of deliveries of a courier.
      Parameters:
      intersection - : intersection where the delivery takes place
      date - : date of the delivery
      timeWindow - : hour of the day when the courier should deliver (he must deliver between timeWindow and timeWindow +1)
      courier - : courier to whom we want to add a delivery

    • addCourierWithName

      public void addCourierWithName(String name, javafx.scene.control.ListView<model.Courier> listView)
      add a courier with a name
      Parameters:
      name - : name of the courier
      listView - : listView of the map where we need to display the added courier

    • getClosestIntersection

      public model.Intersection getClosestIntersection(float latitude, float longitude, long idIntersection)
      get the closest intersection from the request coordinates
      Parameters:
      latitude - : latitude of the requested point on the map
      longitude - : longitude of the requested point on the map
      idIntersection - : id of Intersection

    • TSP

      public void TSP(model.Tour tour)
      calculates the shortest tour composed of one or multiple delivery points
      Parameters:
      tour - : the tour that will be used for the calculations
